org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer

Class ServerWps20

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer.EmulatedServer
      • org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer.ServerWps20

  • public class ServerWps20
extends EmulatedServer
    Class to emulate an OGC WPS 2.0 instance. Pass in the client request and servlet response to #handleRequest, and the method will auto fill the servlet response. Details of how this fake WPS 2.0 works are based on OGC WPS 2.0.2 Interface Standard: Corrigendum 2 (OGC 14-065r2), and OGC Web Services Common Standard version 2.0.0 (OGC 06-121r9).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerWps20

        public ServerWps20(ServerOptions options)
        Create an emulated WPS 2.0. Currently hard-codes the output style for the XML string to have indented XML, and the XML declaration.
        Parameters:
        options - ServerOptions object with emulated server configuration

                   throws TransformerException
        Build a valid WPS 2.0 response for the client request, and automatically complete the response.
        Overrides:

        response - Response to build to send back to client

      • buildCapabilities

        public void buildCapabilities(org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                              boolean completeCapabilities)
                       throws TransformerException
        Return an HTTP response to the client with valid headers and a body containing the Capabilities XML document. If `completeCapabilities` is true, then a complete capabilities document with a Content section (Layers) will be generated, and the embedded links will use the "/full" URL. If false, then a partial capabilities document will be generated without a Content section (Contents), and clients must use authentication to request the complete capabilities. Source: OGC 14-065r2, Annex B.4.2; OGC 06-121r9 Section 7
        Parameters:
        request - Source request from client, used to build absolute URLs for HREFs
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        completeCapabilities - If true, build a complete capabilities document
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream

      • buildException

        public void buildException(String reason,
                           int code,
                           org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws TransformerException
        Return an Exception Report for `reason`. Response will have content type "text/xml" and HTTP status code defined by `code`. Source: OGC 06-121r9 Section 8
        Parameters:
        reason - String with reason for the Exception Report.
        code - Integer for HTTP status code
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream

      • buildInvalidParameterException

        public void buildInvalidParameterException(org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                    throws TransformerException
        Return an Exception Report for Invalid Parameters. Response will have content type "text/xml" and HTTP status code 400. Source: OGC 06-121r9 Section 8
        Parameters:
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream

      • buildNotSupportedException

        public void buildNotSupportedException(org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                throws TransformerException
        Return an Exception Report for `reason`. Response will have content type "text/xml" and HTTP status code 501. Source: OGC 06-121r9 Section 8
        Parameters:
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream
